SpanishDescription: Error – Funcion no disponible para ese usuario
EnglishDescription: Error – Function Not Available for Selected Issuer

EnglishDescription: Error – API credentials are not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – Invalid Wallet ID

EnglishDescription: Error – Invalid CardIssuerBinID

EnglishDescription: Error – The CardIssuerBinID used is not valid on the WalletID supplied

EnglishDescription: Error – The FirstName is not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – The LastName is not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – The AdrLine1 is not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – The State is not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – The Country is not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – The ZipCode is not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – The PhoneNumber is not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – The CardToken is not valid

EnglishDescription: Error – The Amount is invalid

SpanishDescription: Error – El CardToken no se encuentra
EnglishDescription: Error – The CardToken is not found

SpanishDescription: Error – El monto a remover desde la Tarjeta es mayor que el balance actual
EnglishDescription: Error – The Amount to remove from the card is more than the cards current balance.

SpanishDescription: Error – El monto a cargar es mayor que los fondos disponibles en el wallet.
EnglishDescription: Error – The amount to load is more than the available funds in the wallet

SpanishDescription: Error – Perdida la configuracion del Wallet
EnglishDescription: Error – Missing Wallet Settings

SpanishDescription: Error – No se puede mostrar el balance del Wallet
EnglishDescription: Error – Could not retrieve wallet balance

SpanishDescription: Error – No hay Transacciones que mostrar para esa Tarjeta
EnglishDescription: Error-No Transactions found for supplied Card Token

SpanishDescription: Error – No se puede actualizar la direccion de la Tarjeta
EnglishDescription: Error – Could not update card’s address

SpanishDescription: Error – El numero proxy es requerido
EnglishDescription: Error – ProxyNum is required

SpanishDescription: Error – El documento de ID no es valido
EnglishDescription: Error – SSN is not valid

SpanishDescription: Error – no se pueden remover los fondos de la Tarjeta
EnglishDescription: Error – Could not remove funds from card

SpanishDescription: Error – No se puede recargar la Tarjeta
EnglishDescription: Error – Could not fund card

SpanishDescription: Error – No se puede obtener el balance de la Tarjeta
EnglishDescription: Error – Could not retrieve the card balance. Please contact support

SpanishDescription: Error – No es posible slavar su Tarjeta en nuestra Base de Datos
EnglishDescription: Error – We were not able to save your card within our db. Please contact support

SpanishDescription: Error – Anormal  error. Contacte la ayuda para asistencia
EnglishDescription: Error – Exception error. Contact support for assistance
